oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Printing Studio Prices
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hatch Show Print (Firm); Offset printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Handwritten notes on the cost posters at other letterpress shops, presumably competitors of Hatch Show Print, including the Globe in Baltimore and Kolorkraft in Oklahoma City. Contact information for Bob Snyder at American Hamilton and the Morgan Sign Machine Company are also listed on the paper. Notes on the Dexter Continuous (stream) feed are written on the bottom of the paper, along with some hand drawn doodles.
